nodes.text: MK5-L1 was a black L-1g general purpose droid that was forced to work as the landing-pad operations droid in the criminal Pyke Syndicate's spice mines on the planet Kessel during the reign of the Galactic Empire. In 10 BBY, MK5-L1 was freed from slavery when its restraining bolt was removed during a slave revolt in the mines started by the droid L3-37.

MK5-L1 first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was first identified in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
